summary:
Experienced Commissioning Operations Professional skilled in all aspects of Oil / Gas plant. 
Proven record in Project and Commissioning work with wide ranging experience. 
Versatile with excellent organizational and interpersonal skills, developed with both large and small organizations.
Experienced in overseas operations environments.


KEY SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

44 years Operations experience gained in commissioning and start up duties.
Experienced operator of DCS control systems, including Honeywell and Foxboro.
Qualified and practiced in PTW co-ordination including Shutdown and Commissioning phases
Experienced in safe working practices including Job Safety Analysis and Risk Assessment.

Languages

English: written & spoken
Dutch: written & spoken

Other Information
Certificates are available for all occupational training and vocational qualifications
